title: Living tomorrow. No. 149
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Science has given time a different meaning - what was once the work of years is now achieved in days; days are reduced to seconds. Looks at a few of the developments which are helping to make this an instant world - computerised graphics; laser welding; portable landing fields equipment.
